name: Tarbal
description:
Help the tarbalists kill the last enforcer, and save them all. Or don't, and get sent back to help them again. 

This game is a short puzzle game with multiple endings, find them all, or simply find the one that grants you victory. Record different channels of a radio, to give the tarbalists the information they need, to survive.

Credits:

Lead developer - Swifcape

Voice Actors:

  • Nina
